title: How to find the location of a person while calling me from his cell phone - Quora

response.answer_text: Other than the first answer… For YOU to be able to track a cell phone, you would have to load tracking software on their phone. That can be a tough, if not impossible thing to do to someone phone. These tracking apps are usually used to load on your kid(s) phone before you give it to them… they have no idea it is on there or that you are tracking them… other than that, refer back to answer 1.
